name: Treachery in Beatdown City: A tactical brawler!
blurb: 3 unique heroes fight punks, thugs & ninjas & more in this innovative brawler with tactics & RPG elements. All to save the president!

rewards.reward: No Reward

EARLY BIRD - BRAWLER! - Receive a digital copy of Treachery in Beatdown City for PC/MAC (if we get listed on Steam you will get that key too!)+ access to the game before the general public close to release and access to backer forums to help vote on ideas at an early bird price! \r\n\r\nYour name will be listed as an EARLY BRAWLER backer in the credits.

BRAWLER! -- Receive a digital copy of Treachery in Beatdown City for PC/MAC (if we get listed on Steam you will get that key too!) + access to the game before the general public close to release and access to backer forums to help vote on ideas! \r\n\r\nYour name will be listed as a BRAWLER backer in the credits.

EARLY FRESH BEATS ---
Receive a digital copy of the full soundtrack to Treachery in Beatdown City when it releases.

+ Receive everything in the EARLY BIRD BRAWLER tier (And immediately receive the already released Treachery in Beatdown City EP when the campaign closes)
DOUBLE BRAWLER - It's a BRAWLER bundle! Get 2 digital copies of Treachery in Beatdown City at a Kickstarter only price + the other perks of being a BRAWLER!

FRESH BEATS ----------------------------Receive a digital copy of the full soundtrack to Treachery in Beatdown City when it releases + Receive everything in the BRAWLER tier (And immediately receive the already released Treachery in Beatdown City EP when the campaign closes)

FIGHTERS' MANUAL 

Receive a digital manual filled with art, back stories, strategies and tips about the game. 

+ Receive everything in the FRESH BEATS tier.

WEAPONIZER - Receive exclusive early access to bonus weapons - The Steel Chair, Brass Knuckles, Nunchucks, and get to vote on 3 more! These will appear in your inventory to use in fights, and also show up in breakable objects. Also includes FIGHTER'S MANUAL tier. 

Also choose to be labeled as a WEAPONIZER in the game's credits.

All tiers above $35 will receive this reward, too!

DEDICATED FIGHTER - Receive access to the earliest, unfinished builds to help with active development of the game. + Receive everything in the FRESH BEATS tier. Your name will be listed under Dedicated Fighter or Brawler in the credits, you decide!
EXTRA DEDICATED FIGHTER ON top of DEDICATED FIGHTER tier, receive a PRINTED manual filled with art, back stories, strategies and tips about the game.

FIGHTING ARTIST - Receive a lovingly laid out digital art book featuring watercolor, ink, pencil and digital art from the game as well as an in depth strategy guide detailing enemy stats, bios, and tips you won't find in the manual! 

+Receive everything in the DEDICATED FIGHTER tier. 

Your name will be listed under Fighting Artist, Dedicated Fighter or Brawler, you decide!

DECKED OUT - Receive exclusive early access to bonus costumes. 3 per character: 2 shown here plus get to help design/vote on the last 1 per character!

+ Receive everything in the DEDICATED FIGHTER TIER

All tiers above $65 will receive this reward, too!

RAD ENOUGH - Are you rad enough to show your solidarity with the citizens of East Fulton to wear this T - SHIRT?

+Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier. 

Your name will be listed in the credits under RAD ENOUGH, Fighting Artist, Dedicated Fighter, or Brawler, you decide!

PHYSICALITY - On top of showing your solidarity for the cause, receive a nice physical copy of the soundtrack. \r\n\r\n+ Receive everything in the RAD ENOUGH tier. Later tiers do not automatically include these items.

EXTRA PHYSICALITY - Receive a lovingly laid out PRINTED art book featuring watercolor, ink, pencil and digital art from the game as well as an in depth strategy guide detailing enemy stats, bios, and tips you won't find in the manual! +Receive everything in the PHYSICALITY tier. Your name will be listed under Fighting Artist, Dedicated Fighter or Brawler, you decide!

POST NO BILLS------------------------------ Get a picture of yourself, a character you created or just your name immortalized on a poster in the background of a fight stage. Warning, 8 bit stylization can be tricky for intricate ideas.

Character must be your own design and we reserve the right to reject any concepts, but we'll work with you to make it fit. 

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier. 

Shirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please  see add-ons section.

SERIOUSLY, POST NO BILLS II----------------- Get a picture of yourself, a character you created or just your name immortalized on a poster in the background of a fight stage. Warning, 8 bit stylization can be tricky for intricate ideas. Character must be your own design and we reserve the right to reject any concepts, but we'll work with you to make it fit. + Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier. \r\n\r\nShirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please see add-ons section.

PAINT THE TOWN - We will make some graffiti using your name, avatar or whatever you want us to or submit your own graffiti design to be pixelated and put in the game (must be your own creation).  We reserve the right to reject any concepts, but will work with you to make sure you are happy.

Does not include POST NO BILLS tier.

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier. 

Shirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please  see add-ons section.

PIXEL PORTRAIT ----- Have your likeness or that of a character you created immortalized in Treachery in Beatdown City style! Receive a digital sprite sheet that includes a detailed portrait, a smaller version of the portrait, as well as regular fighter style character complete with walk cycle and a couple of attacks! 

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier. 

Does not include POST NO BILLS or PAINT THE TOWN tier.

Shirt + Physical Soundtrack not included. Please  see add-ons section.

Designer of Terror - Help us design 1 of the Ninja Dragon Terrorist enemies! This group is so mysterious that very few people have ever seen any of them and lived. 

They are known for their cross cultural garbs, and you can help design one with the team. Choose their color palette/accessories, fighting style and more! 

We reserve the right to reject any concepts, but we will work with you over skype one on one to make sure everyone is happy.

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier!

FINE ART OF FIGHTING - Receive a physical water color and ink drawing of any enemy,  signed by the artist Diana Santiago!

Also receive a digital scan of the file.

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier!

Does not Include Designer of Terror

VAIN FIGHTER - Receive a physical water color and ink drawing of yourself done in Treachery in Beatdown City style (in an action pose if you want!) - signed by the artist Diana Santiago!

Also receive a digital scan of the file.

And you will have your name in the credits apart from other backer credits in a special thank you section.

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier!

ULTIMATE COUNTER 
Have your likeness placed as an enemy on the streets of East Fulton! You will be an alternate to one of the regular enemies but with increased stats. 

You will receive everything in PIXEL PORTRAIT tier (sprite sheet, etc.) + you will have a bio in the game, as well as a cutscene featuring your character that you will get to help write!

Also receive ULTIMATE COUNTER backer credit and a special thank you.

+ Receive everything in the PIXEL PORTRAIT TIER

BEATDOWN TOUR Come to New York City (flight and living arrangements not included) and have a tour with the team of New York from their unique perspective. We'll even buy you lunch at one of our favorite places, Katz' deli! 

These tours will begin after the game is done.

Also receive BEATDOWN TOURIST credit and a special thank you. 

+ Receive everything in the FIGHTING ARTIST tier!
